name: The Fall of House Misra
description:
This game is not suited for people under 16 years of age. 

View the content warning below to play it safe ❤  

CONTENT WARNING
  • Blood
  • Violence
  • Death
  • Implied off-screen torture
  • War
  • Mild cursing

The Fall of House Misra is a short visual novel game made for Yandere Game Jam. It is not a polished game, but it is fully playable. I plan on adding more music and fixing some sprite issues. Maybe I'll make a colored version too!

The Story

The game follows the events that led to the demise of House Misra. At the center of it is the heroine, Shani, who is recovering from a battle injury back at the palace, while her father fights the war against House Desai. Shani wishes to get back to the battlefield, however, her plans are ruined when her father urges her to accept a marriage to form an alliance with House Narand. On top of it all, he sends her a knight to fend off assassins.

Can Shani make the right decisions for herself and her people when she doesn't know whom to trust?

The Game Specs
  • 4K words
  • 4 endings
  • 2 love interests (even though this is more of a drama than a dating sim)
Credits
  • Game development by Ebbasuke
  • Free music from the wonderful Turku, Nomads of the Silk Road
  • SFX from Freesound (CC0) and Sonniss
